title: National Center for Health Statisticss
cleaned_text: National Center for Health Statisticss [2021 emergency department data from the National Hospital Ambulatory Medical Care Survey](/nchs/products/databriefs/db478.htm) Read the report. [Historical Surveys](/nchs/surveys.htm#tabs-1-4) An overview of surveys and programs administered by the National Center for Health Statistics that have been completed. Data Integration Data Tools Data Visualizations Historic and Discontinued Publications [Data Visualizations](/nchs/data-visualization) A collection of interactive tools that present NCHS data in a visually engaging format. [Visual Abstracts](/nchs/products/visuals.htm) Collection of products for disseminating scientific research in an engaging, easily digestible way. These serve as an adjunct to a full scientific report.
